title: What is this statue?
selftext:
https://twitter.com/historydefined/status/1583677126745542656

I can't seem to find the full picture of this statue. Anyone know? Thank you
comments:
> Detail of a bronze statue of Standing **Parvati**. Chola period, c.1200 CE, Tamil Nadu, India 

It says Parvati right in its description. 🤷‍♂️
and why you think i wasn't able to read that? there are many parvati statues none which match that one
I had seen a similar one on an Instagram account recently. I couldn't find it now. Will drop the link if i find it again.
